values: The Gospel in the Church for the Obedience of Faith Through Spiritual GiftsThe Gospel in the Church for the Obedience of Faith Through Spiritual Gifts

Grace pays the debt we owe God for stealing his glory. And now we owe the gospel to any who still need God’s grace.Grace pays the debt we owe God for stealing his glory. And now we owe the gospel to any who still need God’s grace.
